org.gbif.api.service.registry

Interface OccurrenceDownloadService


  • public interface OccurrenceDownloadService
    Interface to access and persists information about occurrence download events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void create(Download download)
      Persists the occurrence download object.
      Download get(String key)
      Retrieves a occurrence download by its unique key.
      PagingResponse<Download> list(Pageable page, Set<Download.Status> status)
      Retrieves a pageable result of all the downloads, optionally the downloads can be filtered by status.
      PagingResponse<Download> listByUser(String user, Pageable page, Set<Download.Status> status)
      Retrieves a pageable result of the downloads created by a user in a given status.
      PagingResponse<DatasetOccurrenceDownloadUsage> listDatasetUsages(String downloadKey, Pageable page)
      Retrieves a pageable result of the dataset usages in a occurrence download.
      void update(Download download)
      Update an existing occurrence download.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        void create(@NotNull
            Download download)
        Persists the occurrence download object. The object must contain a unique key, the persistence storage doesn't generate one for it.

      • get

        Download get(@NotNull
             String key)
        Retrieves a occurrence download by its unique key.

      • list

        PagingResponse<Download> list(@Nullable
                              Pageable page,
                              @Nullable
                              Set<Download.Status> status)
        Retrieves a pageable result of all the downloads, optionally the downloads can be filtered by status.

      • listByUser

        PagingResponse<Download> listByUser(@NotNull
                                    String user,
                                    @Nullable
                                    Pageable page,
                                    @Nullable
                                    Set<Download.Status> status)
        Retrieves a pageable result of the downloads created by a user in a given status.

      • update

        void update(@NotNull
            Download download)
        Update an existing occurrence download.

      • listDatasetUsages

        PagingResponse<DatasetOccurrenceDownloadUsage> listDatasetUsages(@NotNull
                                                                 String downloadKey,
                                                                 @Nullable
                                                                 Pageable page)
        Retrieves a pageable result of the dataset usages in a occurrence download.
